mapper.select: SELECT sys_rights.user_id,sys_rights.role_id,sys_rights.org_id,sys_role.role_code, sys_role.role_name,sys_organization.org_name,sys_organization.org_code FROM sys_rights JOIN sys_role ON (sys_rights.role_id = sys_role.id AND sys_role.delete_mark = FALSE) JOIN sys_organization ON (sys_rights.org_id = sys_organization.id AND sys_organization.delete_mark = FALSE) WHERE sys_rights.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sys_rights.user_id,sys_rights.role_id,sys_rights.org_id,sys_role.role_code, sys_role.role_name,sys_organization.org_name,sys_organization.org_code FROM sys_rights JOIN sys_role ON (sys_rights.role_id = sys_role.id AND sys_role.delete_mark = FALSE) JOIN sys_organization ON (sys_rights.org_id = sys_organization.id AND sys_organization.delete_mark = FALSE) WHERE sys_rights.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_rights.role_id = #{roleId} AND sys_rights.role_id = #{roleId}
